# Support for Fax Compiler

This document provides information on how to get support for the Fax Compiler.

## üìö Documentation

Before seeking support, please check our documentation:

- [README.md](README.md) - Getting started and overview
- [RELEASE_NOTES.md](RELEASE_NOTES_v0.0.1-pre-alpha.md) - Latest release information
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) - Contribution guidelines
- [Examples](faxc/examples/) - Code examples

## üêõ Bug Reports

If you found a bug, please create an issue:

1. **Check existing issues**: Search [open issues](https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/issues) to see if it's already reported
2. **Create new issue**: Use the [Bug Report template](https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
3. **Provide details**: Include steps to reproduce, expected behavior, actual behavior, and environment info

## üí° Feature Requests

Have an idea for improvement?

1. **Check existing requests**: Search [open issues](https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/issues)
2. **Create feature request**: Use the [Feature Request template](https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
3. **Discuss**: Engage with the community in the issue comments

## üí¨ Questions & Discussions

For general questions and discussions:

- **GitHub Discussions**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/discussions
  - Ask questions
  - Share ideas
  - Show what you've built
  - Get help from the community

## üîí Security Issues

**DO NOT** create public issues for security vulnerabilities.

Report security issues privately:
- **GitHub Security Advisories**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/security/advisories/new
- **Email**: security@github.com/Luvion1 (if configured)

See [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md) for details.

## üè¢ Commercial Support

For commercial support, licensing, or consulting:

- **Email**: contact@github.com/Luvion1 (if configured)
- **Sponsorship**: https://github.com/sponsors/Luvion1 (if configured)

## üìñ Additional Resources

- **Website**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax
- **Releases**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/releases
- **Actions (CI)**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/actions
- **Dependabot**: https://github.com/Luvion1/Fax/dependabot

## ü§ù Community

Join our community:

- **Discord**: [Invite link] (if configured)
- **Twitter**: [@Luvion1] (if configured)
- **Reddit**: [r/rust] (if configured)

## üìã Issue Labels

We use the following labels to organize issues:

| Label | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `bug` | Something isn't working correctly |
| `enhancement` | New feature or request |
| `documentation` | Documentation improvements |
| `good first issue` | Good for newcomers |
| `help wanted` | Extra attention needed |
| `question` | Further information needed |
| `wontfix` | This will not be worked on |

## ‚è±Ô∏è Response Time

We aim to respond to:

- **Bug reports**: Within 48 hours
- **Feature requests**: Within 1 week
- **Questions**: Within 1 week
- **Security issues**: Within 24 hours

Note: This is a pre-alpha project maintained by volunteers. Response times may vary.

## ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank You

Thank you for using Fax Compiler and for being part of our community!
